tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BiomassResources (
  region VARCHAR(255),
  biomass_type VARCHAR(255),
  biomass_quantity DECIMAL,
  biomass_unit VARCHAR(10),
  PRIMARY KEY (region, biomass_type)
)

CREATE TABLE biomass_resources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  biomass_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  biomass_quantity DECIMAL,
  harvest_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE biomass_production (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_id INT NOT NULL,
  production_date TIMESTAMP,
  production_quantity DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_resource_id FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES biomass_resources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE biomass_transactions (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    producer_id UUID,
    consumer_id UUID,
    quantity_sold FLOAT,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Biomass_Resources (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  region VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  biomass_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Biomass_Distribution (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  region VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  distribution_center VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL,
  delivery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Biomass_Energy_Performance (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  region VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  energy_output DECIMAL,
  efficiency DECIMAL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Biomass_Transportation (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  region VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transportation_mode VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  distance DECIMAL,
  transport_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Biomass_Conversion (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  biomass_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  conversion_technology VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  conversion_rate DECIMAL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);
